law.catch_line: Disbursement of funds for Local Match Participation Program.

text.section: The commissioner of the Department for Local Government shall administer and determine the disbursement of funds for the Local Match Participation Program.

Funds appropriated for the Local Match Participation Program may be used as matching funds by local governments for flood-related projects and straight sewage pipe removal projects with:
The United States Army Corps of Engineers;
The Federal Emergency Management Agency (FEMA); and
Other federal government grant and loan programs requiring local matching funds.

Any general fund appropriations made for the Local Match Participation Program may be used for flood control planning and mitigation activities and straight sewage pipe removal and mitigation activities.

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 117, sec. 10, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 47, sec. 71, effective June 26, 2007. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 331, sec. 1, effective July 14, 2000. -- Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 187, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1998.
